issue.title: Allow node communication outside the LAN

content.raw: Carlos Aguero, thank you for the information, your explanation makes sense. However, even though (according to IGN_VERBOSE), the two networked machines are registering but are not sending messages. I.E call back for subscriber is never triggered.  As this is not captured in the issues, would you prefer i create an issue?
content.html: Carlos Aguero, thank you for the information, your explanation makes sense. However, even though (according to IGN_VERBOSE), the two networked machines are registering but are not sending messages. I.E call back for subscriber is never triggered. As this is not captured in the issues, would you prefer i create an issue?
